directions: Place the rice in a casserole or claypot. Place the marinated chicken on the rice, in the centre.

Place the Chinese sausages and waxed duck slices around the chicken. Top the chicken with the ginger strips. Steam casserole dish for about 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked. If using claypot, cook covered, on the fire.

In a small saucepan, bring the sauce ingredient to a quick boil. Remove from heat and pour the sauce onto the rice. Garnish with spring onions. To serve, mix the rice and meats well before portioning out.
ingredients: 150g chicken meat, diced and marinated with 1/4 teaspoon oil and 1/4 teaspoon cornflour
3 slices ginger, cut into thin strips
title: Steamed Rice with Waxed Meat in Casserole
